00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_SOCKET_NOTIFIER_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_SOCKET_NOTIFIER_H_
00031 
00032 #include "mimas/mimas.h"
00033 
00034 #include <QtCore/QSocketNotifier>
00035 
00036 using namespace lubyk;
00037 
00038 namespace mimas {
00039 
00047 class SocketNotifier : public QSocketNotifier, public ThreadedLuaObject {
00048   Q_OBJECT
00049 public:
00050   enum EventType {
00051     Read  = QSocketNotifier::Read,
00052     Write = QSocketNotifier::Write,
00053   };
00054 
00055   SocketNotifier(int fd, int event_type)
00056       : QSocketNotifier(fd, (QSocketNotifier::Type)event_type) {
00057     QObject::connect(this, SIGNAL(activated(int)),
00058                      this, SLOT(activatedSlot(int)));
00059 
00060     //printf("[%p] SocketNotifier\n", this);
00061     MIMAS_DEBUG_CC
00062   }
00063 
00064   virtual ~SocketNotifier() {
00065     //printf("[%p] ~SocketNotifier\n", this);
00066     MIMAS_DEBUG_GC
00067   }
00068 
00069   int socket() const {
00070     return QSocketNotifier::socket();
00071   }
00072 
00073 
00076   void setEnabled(bool enabled) {
00077     QSocketNotifier::setEnabled(enabled);
00078   }
00079 
00080 private slots:
00081   void activatedSlot(int socket) {
00082     //printf("[%p] activatedSlot %i (%s)\n", this, socket, isEnabled() ? "ON" : "OFF");
00083     // Callback
00084     // FIXME: ThreadedLuaObject stores L as lua_ (no need for a new thread)
00085     lua_State *L = lua_;
00086     // FIXME: We might need less lua threads and faster access to callbacks.
00087     // We could use:
00088     // 1. ref for global weak value table set on create (func_list_idx_)
00089     // lua_rawgeti(L, LUA_REGISTRYINDEX, func_list_idx_)
00090     // 2. ref for callback set in weak on create (luaL_ref)
00091     // lua_rawgeti(L, -1, clbk_idx_)
00092     //
00093     if (pushLuaCallback("activated")) {
00094       // <func> <self>
00095       int status = lua_pcall(L, 1, 0, 0);
00096 
00097       if (status) {
00098         // cannot raise an error here...
00099         fprintf(stderr, "Error in 'callback': %s\n", lua_tostring(L, -1));
00100       }
00101     } else {
00102       printf("NO CALLBACK!\n");
00103     }
00104   }
00105 };
00106 
00107 } // mimas
00108 #endif // LUBYK_INCLUDE_MIMAS_SOCKET_NOTIFIER_H_
